title: Emerald Cascade Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Statement Piece
materials: this haaram features meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. The focal point is a stunning 6.15 carat pear-shaped emerald
showcasing exceptional clarity and vibrant green hue. Ruby accent stones add a touch of crimson sparkle.
features: This modern haaram design features a cascading arrangement of diamond-encrusted leaves, gracefully flowing towards the center. A large pear-cut emerald, secured in a bezel setting, serves as the central focal point. The intricate lattice work is a nod to traditional South Indian jewelry design, interpreted with a contemporary flair.
colors: accented by the vibrant green of the emerald and the subtle crimson of the rubies.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Veedukollu)
and milestone anniversaries. Also suitable for high-end galas and red carpet events where a statement piece is desired.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional inspiration with modern design sensibilities. The use of platinum and high-quality diamonds ensures lasting value and brilliance. The emerald symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making it a meaningful heirloom piece. Its unique design sets it apart from conventional heavy gold haarams while maintaining an opulent aesthetic.
